title: Manhattan Project National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Manhattan Project National Historical Park is a partnership park.  The National Park Service is responsible for administration, interpretation, and education at the three sites and will provide technical assistance to resource preservation efforts.  The Department of Energy will continue to have responsibility for management, operations, maintenance, and historic preservation of the historic Manhattan Project sites now under their jurisdiction.  Other agencies, communities, organizations, and associated tribes may also become involved to tell the full story of the Manhattan Project. Efforts are underway to develop a Friends Group and other formal partnering arrangements.
